DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to follow the management of blood lipids in patients with planned percutaneous coronary intervention (widening of coronary vessels) in a period from 6 to 10 weeks after the intervention.
DOC.brief_title: Lipid-lowering Therapy for Secondary Prevention in Patients Undergoing Elective Percutaneous Coronary Intervention (PCI)
